Class UZPlayerManagerV1

  • java.lang.Object
    • vn.uiza.uzv1.manager.UZPlayerManagerV1
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.github.rubensousa.previewseekbar.PreviewLoader, com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.ads.AdsMediaSource.MediaSourceFactory

    public final class UZPlayerManagerV1
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.ads.AdsMediaSource.MediaSourceFactory, com.github.rubensousa.previewseekbar.PreviewLoader
    Manages the ExoPlayer, the IMA plugin and all video playback.
